channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New Galaxy S25 Edge Leak Reveals Samsung’s Valuable Surprise Offer
item.description: Samsung’s forthcoming super-slim Galaxy S25 Edge smartphone is tipped for a valuable promotional bundle.

item.title: Asking for directions

item.title: The Best Show On TV Has To Be ‘The Pitt,’ Right?
item.description: There are a number of high profile shows currently airing on all manner of streaming services, but The Pitt has to be the best of them right now.

item.title: Time To Rework Destiny 2’s Court Of Blades Loot Drops
item.description: Destiny 2's Court of Blades is a fun activity in Act 2 here, but its loot distribution is a lot worse than in Nether.
